name: Arcade Solutions, Inc.
description: Developer of workforce productivity software designed to capture the social and competitive motivators to increase sales conversion. The company's software turns monthly sales quotas into exciting daily contests for salespeople, enabling businesses to connect and engage with their employees and increase sales.
one_liner: Developer of workforce productivity software designed to capture the social and competitive motivators to increase sales conversion. The company's software turns monthly sales quotas into exciting daily contests for salespeople, enabling businesses to connect and engage with their employees and increase sales.
